page.title: 03A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: Vegetables include lettuce,radish and onions,or cucumber,celery and apple. We sometimes have ham which is meat from a pig.After dinner we have play time.Me,Kerry and Angela go to flute and clarinet lessons.We go to {Kirk Hammerton}school to join with other children.When we come back we have to catch up with the work that the other children are doing.When it is nearly home time our teacher reads us a story.Then I go home on{Mr. {Conning's}bus.I meet my mum at the gate and we go home.After school I watch T.V. About 5 o'clock I take the dog for a walk then I give him his dinner.Then I take him to my dad's van.I go inside and have my tea.I go for a walk.Afterwards I practise my flute.Then I have a bath,watch T.V.,then go to bed.I read until I feel tired then I go to sleep.
